languages.text: "Зачем простолюдинам столько места? Это нерационально, они могут быть размещены значительно компактнее".
"Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."
languages.original_text: "Зачем простолюдинам столько места? Это нерационально, они могут быть размещены значительно компактнее".

traits.locale_text: "Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."
"Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."
"Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."
"Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."

languages.text: “为什么给下层的人分配这么多空间？这种做法缺乏效率，他们本可以安置得更加紧凑。”
languages.original_text: "Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."

traits.locale_text: “为什么给下层的人分配这么多空间？这种做法缺乏效率，他们本可以安置得更加紧凑。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué se dedica tanto espacio a las castas inferiores? Es poco eficiente. Se les podría acomodar de forma mucho más compacta».
languages.original_text: "Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué se dedica tanto espacio a las castas inferiores? Es poco eficiente. Se les podría acomodar de forma mucho más compacta».

languages.text: 「なぜ下層階級にこれほどのスペースが割り当てられているのですか？非効率です。彼らは、もっとコンパクトに収容できるはずです」
languages.original_text: "Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ下層階級にこれほどのスペースが割り当てられているのですか？非効率です。彼らは、もっとコンパクトに収容できるはずです」

languages.text: "Warum wird den unteren Rängen so viel Platz zugeteilt? Das ist ineffizient. Sie könnten deutlich kompakter untergebracht werden."
languages.original_text: "Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."

traits.locale_text: "Warum wird den unteren Rängen so viel Platz zugeteilt? Das ist ineffizient. Sie könnten deutlich kompakter untergebracht werden."

languages.text: « Pourquoi les communautés inférieures jouissent-elles d'autant d'espace ? C'est contre-productif. Ces gens pourraient s'accommoder de bien moins. »
languages.original_text: "Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi les communautés inférieures jouissent-elles d'autant d'espace ? C'est contre-productif. Ces gens pourraient s'accommoder de bien moins. »

languages.text: "Aşağı seviye düzenlere neden bu kadar çok alan ayrılmış? Hiç etkili değil. Çok daha kompakt bir yaşam alanı tasarlanabilirdi."
languages.original_text: "Why is so much space allotted to the lower orders? It is inefficient. They could be accommodated much more compactly."

traits.locale_text: "Aşağı seviye düzenlere neden bu kadar çok alan ayrılmış? Hiç etkili değil. Çok daha kompakt bir yaşam alanı tasarlanabilirdi."
